metadata.name: 01 - quercus
metadata.description: The source of the animations of the project are created by measuring micro-current fluctuations in the leaves of the plants and converting the changes in the conductors into MIDI notes with the PlantWave device. Animations were created by converting collected MIDI data into audio files. The project consists of 10 animated poster designs created by controlling different animation parameters of the frequencies of the sound files obtained from 10 plants.
